class.name: VisualScriptLists
class.brief_description: A Visual Script virtual class for in-graph editable nodes.
class.description: A Visual Script virtual class that defines the shape and the default behavior of the nodes that have to be in-graph editable nodes.

method.name: add_input_data_port
method.description: Adds an input port to the Visual Script node.

method.name: add_output_data_port
method.description: Adds an output port to the Visual Script node.

method.name: remove_input_data_port
method.description: Removes an input port from the Visual Script node.

method.name: remove_output_data_port
method.description: Removes an output port from the Visual Script node.

method.name: set_input_data_port_name
method.description: Sets the name of an input port.

method.name: set_input_data_port_type
method.description: Sets the type of an input port.

method.name: set_output_data_port_name
method.description: Sets the name of an output port.

method.name: set_output_data_port_type
method.description: Sets the type of an output port.
